r.d: Igbinary is a drop in replacement for the standard php serializer. Instead of the time and space consuming textual representation used by PHP's serialize(), igbinary stores php data structures in a compact binary form. Savings are significant when using memcached or similar memory based storages for serialized data.
r.n: * Fix test failures in php 8.4.0alpha1 due to tests calling deprecated functions (#390)
